name: SCADA Application Maintenance Framework
short_description: This is application primarily designed and used for documented update of CitectSCADA multi cluster application with multiprocess runtime support. Server side is .NET C# application with XML configuration of site topology and file directory structure of application to be deployed. Client side is Active X control with Cicode interface for perform update on SCADA station and possible inform of operator. Synchronization of application is done with usage of MS Sync Framework. Application has centralised logging on server side about progress of update with possibility of archive CitectSCADA logs from stations on server for archivation purposes.
